author: amaltaro
body:
This PR brings the following changes:
* upgrade py2-cx-oracle from 5.2.1 to 7.3.0
* remove old py2-cx-oracle51.spec spec
* move ASO and CRABServer to the latest cx-oracle version (7.3.0)

This has been (or is being) discussed in this HN thread:
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/webInterfaces/1763.html

however, people didn't raise any strong concerns not to upgrade it and proceed with further tests in cmsweb-testbed.

It's already written in that email thread, but here is the list of services affected by this upgrade:
PHEDEX-web.spec
confdb.spec
crabcache.spec
dbs3-migration.spec
dbs3.spec
frontend.spec
overview.spec
popdbweb.spec
sitedb.spec
t0.spec
t0wmadatasvc.spec
victorweb.spec
webtools.spec
wmagent.spec

Release notes can be found here: https://cx-oracle.readthedocs.io/en/latest/release_notes.html#version-7-3-december-2019

And big thanks to @smuzaffar and @belforte for getting this spec fixed.
FYI @yuyiguo .
title: Upgrade cx-Oracle from 5.2.1 to 7.3.0
